long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify AI Medical Scribe Dashboard Extension:

Enhance your workflow with Simplify's AI-powered medical scribe directly integrated into your browser. The Simplify Chrome Extension provides seamless access to your personalized Simplify dashboard without needing to switch tabs or navigate through different applications. Stay focused on your patient encounters while Simplify listens, processes, and generates suggested medical notes.

Legal Disclaimer: We Provide General Information Only, Not Billing, Coding, or Medical Advice. We Do Not Guarantee the Accuracy of This Material Generated by Simplify or That the Use of Such Codes or Material Will Result in Payment or Reimbursement or That They Will Be Accurate in Anyway. The Platform is Not a Substitute for Billing and Coding Advice From Qualified Billers and Coding Experts Nor a Substitute for Any Other Forms of Qualified Analytics.
